SEARCH
Package fr.esiee.baba.model

Class Level

java.lang.Object
fr.esiee.baba.model.Level
public class Level extends Object
Manages a single game level in "BABA IS YOU", including the game grid, rules, and game state. This class encapsulates the logic required to interact with and modify the game environment.

  • Constructor Details

    • Level

      public Level(List<List<Cellule>> grid, String levelFilePath)
      Constructor for the Level class. Initializes the grid, sets up the rules, and marks the level as not completed.
      Parameters:
      grid - the grid of cells that make up the level layout.
      levelFilePath - the file path of the level file.

  • Method Details

    • getGrid

      public List<List<Cellule>> getGrid()
      Retrieves the current state of the game grid.
      Returns:
      the grid, a list of lists containing cells.

    • getLevelFilePath

      public String getLevelFilePath()
      Retrieves the file path of the level file.
      Returns:
      the level file path.

    • render

      public void render()
      Displays the current state of the grid to the console, representing each cell's contents.

    • update

      public void update(Direction direction, boolean isJump)
      Updates the game level based on player movement in the specified direction. This includes moving entities, applying transformations, and reinitializing the rules.
      Parameters:
      direction - the direction of movement triggered by the player.
      isJump - whether the entity can jump or not.

    • printCellContent

      public void printCellContent(int x, int y)
      Prints the content of a specific cell at the given coordinates. Useful for debugging or for displaying the cell state during gameplay.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the cell.
      y - the y-coordinate of the cell.

    • printGridContent

      public void printGridContent()
      Prints the contents of all cells in the grid. This method loops through the entire grid and prints the contents of each cell.

    • isCompleted

      public boolean isCompleted()
      Checks if the level has been completed, i.e., if the win condition has been met.
      Returns:
      true if the level is completed, false otherwise.

    • getYouElements

      public Set<Element> getYouElements()
      Retrieves the elements that have the "YOU" property in the level.
      Returns:
      a set of elements with the "YOU" property.
